basics.name: Fetra Rasolonjatovo
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: I bring extensive experience as a web developer, with a track record spanning several years. Over the last two years, I've transitioned my focus from PHP to Python and JavaScript, contributing to various projects. My proficiency covers the entire development lifecycle. I am seeking a Python/React developer position.

work.name: Paositra Malagasy
work.summary: Paositra Malagasy is the national postal service of Madagascar. It is responsible for providing postal services and delivery of mail and packages within the country and to international destinations.
highlights: Developed responsive web applications ensuring user experience across devices.
Worked on front and backend development to maintain application functionality.
Designed and developed the database structure and schema.
Collaborated with designers to implement UI designs and improve frontend aesthetics.
Deployed applications to both testing and production environments, ensuring seamless transitions from development to production.
Assisted developers in coding development tasks.

work.name: Paositra Malagasy

highlights: Implemented SAGE Compta to streamline accounting operations, ensuring accurate recordkeeping, generating precise financial reports, and enhancing overall financial management.

courses: DevOps: Git, Github, Github Action, Heroku, Docker
